articles.title: AHA News: Blood Clot Risk Remains Elevated Nearly a Year After COVID-19 - 69News WFMZ-TV

articles.title: Family of American says he was freed by Taliban in swap - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: An American contractor held hostage in Afghanistan for more than two years by the Taliban has been released, his family said Monday, as a Taliban drug lord jailed by the United States was also freed and returned to Kabul.

articles.title: At least 50 groups in the US advocated to ban books in the past year - CNN
articles.description: At least 50 groups have recently played a role in the evolving movement to have books removed from schools, a new PEN America analysis shows.

articles.title: At Scientific American: Webb Is Breaking the Big Bang Paradigm - Walter Bradley Center for Natural and Artificial Intelligence
articles.description: The Big Bang as a basic concept will doubtless survive. But much “settled science” seems to be getting a, perhaps needed, shakeup.
